title: Drawing, "Two Studies of Daniel Hun", 1881
medium:
Graphite, White Chalk
Support: Blue-Green Wove Paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: Cable Projectors Verso: Inscribed in graphite at upper right: Color of head-/diffused - heightened at cheek and lower/part toward whiskers=tinges of warm/neut yellow & reddish brown at eye brows/=hair light brown-turning considerably/grey-whiskers lighter grey-/-hair at top shows the flesh through/-thin, eyes grey blue-/nose-enriched with neutral/red & broken/lips=considerable cool red/-chin broken colors-colorito/forte-hands more/delicate-palid with/veins showing; at lower right: for Mr. R.L. Stuart

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two Studies of Daniel Hun", 1881.
1881. Graphite, White Chalk
Support: Blue-Green Wove Paper. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-1046.
